titleInfo.title: Big Western Dance featuring Hank Snow at Pflugerville Dessau Hall

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) Hatch poster announcing the Big Western Dance featuring the Grand Ole Opry star Hank Snow and his Rainbow Ranch Boys at the Dessau Hall.
